name: hyper-potion
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 200 HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
flavor_text.platinum: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
